mount.h¶

Overview¶

Related Modules:

FS

Description:

Provides functions for mounting and unmounting a file system.

Since:

1.0

Version:

1.0

Description

mount (const char source, const chartarget, const char filesystemtype, unsigned long mountflags, const voiddata)

Mounts a file system.

int

Unmounts a file system.
